2-IN-1 STYLING: Unlock the 45mm barrel for deep waves or lock in place for voluminous curls. Designed for effortless styling, this versatile tool creates beachy waves or defined curls with ease.
TOURMALINE CERAMIC TECHNOLOGY: The smooth, friction-free surface evenly distributes heat, reducing breakage and enhancing shine. Provides gentle styling for soft, frizz-free, and long-lasting results.
GENTLE HEAT: Heats hair from the inside out to help maintain moisture and reduce heat exposure. The even heat application prevents hot spots, leaving hair soft, shiny, and healthy-looking.
DIGITAL TEMPERATURE CONTROL: Adjustable heat settings adapt to all hair types, from fine to coarse. The easy-to-read digital display ensures precise styling, allowing you to create long-lasting styles without excessive heat.
TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: Lightweight design with a 360° swivel cord ensures comfort and ease of use. Includes a heat-resistant glove for safety and dual voltage compatibility for worldwide travel.
input.description:
The Pentacle Curling Wand is two tools in one. Create fun crimps and unique waves -- or transform your hair with a locking 45mm barrel for huge, jaw-dropping curls.

Crimp: Go for maximum volume or awaken your inner mermaid with rows of "V" shaped crimps.

Curl: Lock the barrel and transform your Pentacle Curling Wand into a traditional wand in our largest size - 45mm - letting you achieve enormous curls and full-bodied waves.

With a barrel made from 100 percent tourmaline ceramic, heat is evenly distributed throughout the heating rod. This makes it gentler than traditional wands, which are only coated with ceramic. Tourmaline emits negatively charged ions that prevent frizz and won't strip your hair of moisture or oils. The results speak for themselves: crimped styles and big, wavy curls with a smooth cuticle and healthy shine!

Our pure tourmaline ceramic styling tools achieve gorgeous results and are safe for all hair types including dry, color treated, fine, medium or coarse.

Heat-resistant glove included.
